articles.title: WPK Central Committee Sends Congratulations to URP
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Sends Congratulations to URP
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Saturday sent a congratulatory message to the 16th Congress of the United Russia Party (URP).
					 The message said that the WPK has always followed the activities of the URP with deep attention and is pleased with the successes made by the URP in its activities to strengthen the party and build powerful modern Russia.
					
					 It wished the URP big success in the congress, expressing expectation and belief that the mutual relations between the two parties would more dynamically develop in the future in conformity with the tradition of the long-standing DPRK-Russia friendship and aspiration and wishes of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a filed survey of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex.
					 He looked round various places of the complex and learned in detail about the Juche iron production.
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened there with attendance of officials concerned. The meeting stressed the need for the workers at the complex to produce more iron and steel and open up a breakthrough in the van for building an economic power, and discussed practical measures.

articles.title: Juche Fertilizer Production on Increase
articles.content:
Juche Fertilizer Production on Increase
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Workers of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex in the DPRK are increasing the production of Juche fertilizer in hearty response to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 According to data available, the complex is carrying out its plan at 117 percent on a daily average.
					
					 The coal dressing supply workshop is increasing the operation rate of wagon tipper and overhead crane to the maximum.
					
					 And the humic acid workshop is thoroughly ensuring the quality of binding material by introducing a new mixing method of raw materials, while the molding workshop is sending quality coal rod to gas generators. 
					
					 The ammonia workshop is sharply boosting the output of ammonia as required by the standard operation regulations.
					
					 Successes have also been made at the compressor and urea workshops.

articles.title: Kumkhop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspeople in DPRK
articles.content:
Kumkhop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspeople in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Kumkhop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspeople in the DPRK produces various kinds of "Kumkhop" goods, drawing popularity among people.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un again visited the factory in January last year and expressed belief that its officials and employees would play the vanguard role in developing the country's foodstuff industry.
					
					 During the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign, the factory directed big efforts to developing tasty foodstuffs.
					
					 According to Sin Hyon Ju, engineer of the factory, it has produced hundreds of kinds of goods which won the ISO 22000. More than 80 kinds of foodstuffs were registered as February 2 Goods.
					
					 Now, the factory is producing foodstuffs helpful to nutrition care of sportspersons and recovery from fatigue, he said.
					
					 He expressed his determination to effect new surge in the production of nutritive foodstuffs on the self-development-first principle.

articles.title: Basketball, Wrestling Rhythmic Exercises Created in DPRK
articles.content:
Basketball, Wrestling Rhythmic Exercises Created in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Rhythmic exercises for basketball and wrestling have been created in the DPRK.
					 O Hye Song, a gymnastics creator of the Korean Mass Gymnastic Production Company, told KCNA:
					
					 The rhythmic exercise for basketball to the tune of songs "O My Motherland Full of Hope" and "Higher and Faster" is popular among basketball players, coaches, reserve players and fans.
					
					 The rhythmic exercise gives a mental stability to players and helps them raise their technique including rate of dunk shot.
					
					 The wrestling rhythmic exercise also wins great popularity among those players.
					
					 According to Yun Jong Hui, a teacher of Korea University of Physical Education, it is helpful to improving the physical flexibility and taking a daring act in match.     
					
					 Han Yong Chol, a composer of the National Folk Art Troupe, said that music for the rhythmic exercises are arranged with cheerful and powerful music by combining advantageous elements of national tune with rhythm of modern music.
					
					 The mass rhythmic exercise was created in Juche 82 (1993) and then followed the rhythmic exercises for boys, old persons and football.
					
					 The newly-created rhythmic exercises are greatly contributing to further developing the specialized sports technique of the country.

articles.title: Chongryon to Strive for Opening Heyday of Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Chongryon to Strive for Opening Heyday of Reunification Movement
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), on Thursday made public a statement supporting the appeal of the joint conference of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 He said that the appeal reflects the firm resolution and enthusiasm of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year marking the 45th anniversary of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, true to the steadfast faith and will of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to achieve the independent reunification of the country and surely build a reunified prosperous country.
					
					 Expressing full support for the appeal, he went on:
					
					 Now the north-south relations are at the worst phase owing to the anti-reunification moves of the south Korean group of traitors and the situation of the Korean peninsula is very tense. However, unshakable is the faith and will of Koreans in Japan to achieve the cause of national reunification on the powerful and independent strength of the Korean nation whose dignity has been displayed thanks to the great persons of Mt Paektu generation after generation.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will take the lead in the drive for opening a way to reunification, upholding the line and policy for independent reunification declared by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the only programme for reunification.
					
					 We will fully discharge our honorable mission and patriotic duty in opening a heyday of nationwide reunification movement in 2017.

articles.title: Data on Japanese Army's Operation of "Comfort Centers" Revealed
articles.content:
Data on Japanese Army's Operation of "Comfort Centers" Revealed
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The director of a cultural institute of south Korea on Jan 18 made it known to the public a data confirming the direct involvement of the Imperial Japanese army in the crimes related to sexual slavery, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The data was a duty diary from March 1 to 31, 1942 kept by a company of the Japanese army, the Yonhap News said, adding:
					
					 The contents of the diary categorically refute the Japanese government's assertion that the "comfort centers" were operated by NGOs.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Humiliating Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Humiliating Diplomacy
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have been thrown into the bottomless quagmire as they have pursued "shrimp-like and blockhead diplomacy" without an iota of independent stand only to be a laughing stock of the international community, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The international isolation and crisis of south Korea are a product of the deep-rooted south Korean politics characterized by sycophancy and submission, the article says, adding: 
					
					 South Korea is a colony of the U.S. which has no shred of sovereignty.
					
					 It is none other than the puppet forces who prolong their remaining days through sycophancy and dependence on outside forces without any proper political philosophy and sovereignty.
					
					 The group of traitors caused trouble by themselves by zealously calling for THAAD deployment under the absurd pretext of coping with the "nuclear threat from the north" while blindly dancing to the tune of the U.S.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group made a humiliating "agreement" to gloss over the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army for a petty amount of money and promised to remove the statue of girl sexual slave. They committed such crimes just to please the Japanese reactionaries and hurt the feelings of the compatriots. 
					
					 The puppet group stand thoroughly isolated politically and economically due to the retaliations of the neighboring countries and are hit hard from all sides. They seek a way out in clinging to the coattail of their American master more tightly, while crying out for "weathering the crisis."
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is the worst group of traitors who should not be allowed to be at large even a moment as they are keen on shameful diplomacy for soliciting cooperation in their campaign for stifling the compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces, still failing to come to their senses. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces would be well advised to bear in mind that they can never escape shame and disaster but will certainly meet their miserable end unless they drop their bad habit of standing in confrontation with compatriots, backed by foreign forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Muscle-flexing
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Muscle-flexing
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers have been staging a madcap mid-winter tactical exercise since Jan 16, vociferating about "nuclear threat from the north" and "ignition of a local war". Shortly ago, the puppet defence affairs agency announced a plan to purchase modern war means including dozens of helicopters for naval operation from abroad, crying out for bolstering up "capability to take emergency counteraction" to cope with the "north's threat of submarine-launched ballistic missile."
					 Commenting on such moves, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 The puppet military of south Korea has become desperate in its saber-rattling and arms buildup against the DPRK at a time when such war-like outbursts as "building security force" and "reacting to provocation" are openly heard from among the puppet authorities, the moves that can never be overlooked.
					
					 This is a dangerous adventure escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and pushing the situation close to a war and a deliberate provocation to kick up war hysteria against the DPRK and stir up "the security crisis" in a bid to provide a way-out to the regime of traitors.
					
					 It is little short of leveling guns at the fellow countrymen earnestly wishing for peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 One's ulterior purpose is clear from one's start. The puppet warmongers' moves aimed at military provocation targeting the fellow countrymen from the beginning of the year fully discloses their criminal scenario to disturb the whole year with saber-rattling for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 If the puppet group persistently pursues its scenario for a war against the DPRK while challenging the nation's sincere efforts for improving the north-south relations and defusing the danger of a war, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will push the war maniacs to the abyss of ruin and bring about a bright dawn of national reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounces Judicature for Protecting Plutocrats
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounces Judicature for Protecting Plutocrats
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People carried an editorial "Non-restraint of Ri Jae Yong is wanton challenge to people's candlelight action" on January 19. 
					 It disclosed that the Seoul Central District Court declined the warrant of arrest for Ri Jae Yong, vice-chairman of Samsung Electronic Co. though he was charged with bribing.
					
					 The south Korean judicature failing to see the mindset of people wantonly challenges the candlelight action of the south Korean people, the editorial held.
					
					 The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo carried a similar editorial on the same day.

articles.title: S. Korea Is Wretched Colonial Stooge of U.S.: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korea Is Wretched Colonial Stooge of U.S.: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- South Korea has become target of derision of the international community as a pronoun of unprecedented shame and disgrace.
					 It is a colony of the U.S. being talked about with scorn and derided by neighboring countries.
					
					 The Washington Post and other world media call north Korea "genuine Korea" and describe south Korea as a political colony of the U.S. They say majority of young south Koreans admire north Korea but paint south Korea as a U.S. colony bereft of any political authority. They comment that south Korea is a "satellite state" of the U.S. and it is a military base which the U.S. established for invading the Asian continent.
					
					 It is well known that south Korea has been reduced to the U.S. colony but it is something unusual that major media openly termed it a colony.
					
					 Media also derided and jeered south Korea, saying its diplomacy has become a laughing stock; it is kicked this way by China and that way by Japan and snubbed even by the U.S. South Korea has turned into a drum beaten at will by China, Japan, Russia and the U.S. to meet their own national interests.
					
					 This is a deserved comment on the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who turned south Korea into a prey of big powers and theatre for escalating confrontation by pursuing its sycophantic and traitorous policy against the national reunification during its tenure.
					
					 In fact, China entered into economic retaliation measure against south Korea in protest against the deployment of THAAD while Japan is taking issue with the girl sexual slave statue set up before its consulate general in Pusan.
					
					 The new administration of the U.S. already appointed its ambassadors to China and Japan but has not yet designated anyone as ambassador to south Korea.
					
					 Without independence, one is bound to be beaten by everyone.
					
					 Traitor Park offered sovereignty in all aspects to the U.S. including food sovereignty and environment sovereignty, to say nothing of those in politics, economy and military in pursuance of its sycophantic and traitorous policy, only to face maltreatment and cold-shoulder.
					
					 It is greatly regretful for south Koreans to have elected her as their "president".
					
					 The south Koreans can never get rid of shame and disgrace as long as they allow the group of anti-reunification sycophantic conservative forces as Park who seek a way-out in escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen while failing to clearly understand who the principal enemy of the nation is.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are now resorting to trick to deceive the public, with their ambition for stay in power, and the U.S. is working by hook or by crook to maintain its colonial system while meddling in the international issue of the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Koreans have to courageously turn out in the pan-national action to foil the challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad going against the nation's desire for reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Urge U.S. to Opt for Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Urge U.S. to Opt for Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- 25 organizations of south Korea, including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Confederation of Trade Unions, reportedly held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Jan. 18 at which they issued a protest letter demanding the U.S. opt for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula.
					 The letter said that the most important issue in the fields of the U.S. diplomacy and security is the Korean issue, but its preceding presidents failed to properly solve it.
					
					 The U.S. should draw a lesson from their failures and make a bold decision to make a switchover in its policy favorable for peace, reunification and dialogue suited to the circumstances of the new era on the peninsula, it said
					
					 It called for concluding the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty, totally stopping the joint military drills, withdrawing the U.S. forces, dissolving the "UN Command", abrogating the unequal "mutual defense treaty" and SOFA, fully opening to media U.S. nuclear weapons deployed in south Korea and retracting the decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 At the end of the conference, the organizations handed the protest letter to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: Former S. Korean Professor Praises Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Former S. Korean Professor Praises Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- A former professor at a university in Kyonggi Province ardently revered President Kim Il Sung, according to Newsis of south Korea on Jan. 18.
					 He read the President's reminiscences "With the Century" in 2006 and has since studied the Juche idea.
					
					 He posted on the website 30 articles from March 2009 to Sept. 2012 dealing with the facts that Kim Il Sung led the Korean people with his brilliant wisdom and distinguished leadership.
					
					 He also posted articles praising the Juche idea and the Songun politics.
					
					 Greatly displeased with his activities, the puppet security authorities of south Korea filed a suit with the court against him on the charge of violating the "Security Law".
					
					 The puppet Seoul Central District Court at a trial sentenced him to one year and six months in prison and one year and six months suspension of qualifications and probation.

articles.title: 35th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea
articles.content:
35th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- An event took place on Jan. 13 to celebrate the 35th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea.
					 On display at its venue were photographs showing the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the development of agriculture in African countries and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, as well as photos showing the history of the Institute.
					
					 Present at the event were personages of the Institute, the Ministry of Agriculture and Kindia Province and popular masses of Guinea.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to this country and his embassy officials were invited.
					
					 Speakers at the event paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the building of a new society in Guinea, especially the development of agriculture, saying that their great devotion will be always kept in the hearts of the Guinean people.
					
					 They also expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, for having shown deep care for the development of the relations between the two countries, true to the cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 They noted that the DPRK government and people have sincerely helped African countries in the agricultural development.
					
					 Wishing the Korean people greater success in the work to build a socialist power and realize the independent reunification of the country under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, they declared that the Guinean government would expand the cooperation with DPRK in various fields including agriculture.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean Youth League Observed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean Youth League Observed in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Student Front of Bangladesh issued a statement in celebration of the 71st founding anniversary of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Today the DPRK regards the idea of valuing the youth as the invariable strategic line under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un who has the same noble outlook on the future and the rising generation as President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and fully demonstrates the dignity and might of the youth power.
					
					 The Korean youths fully perform their duty in safeguarding the country and play the core and leading role in building a socialist power, enhancing the people's standard of living and conquering the fortress of ultra-modern science and technology.
					
					 The future of the DPRK is rosy as it has a huge army of youths who dynamically advance along the road of the Korean revolution.
					
					 We highly praise the successes made by the Korean youths in building a socialist power and warmly congratulate the 71st anniversary of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Spain
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Spain
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Barcelona of Spain was formed on Jan. 8.
					 Sebastian Gonzalez, secretary of the Korean Friendship Association, was elected chief of the group.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support DPRK's Right to Self-Defence
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support DPRK's Right to Self-Defence
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement in denunciation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK on January 9.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK's preparations for the test launch of ICBM at the final stage.
					
					 The DPRK's ICBM development is just as it is part of bolstering up its capability for self-defence to cope with the ever-growing nuclear war threat by the U.S. 
					
					 The deputy secretary of state of the U.S. recently told that the DPRK's threat reached the extreme phase and any administration of the U.S. would continue as ever to impose sanctions and pressure on it.
					
					 The very one which forced the DPRK to develop ICBM for self-defence is the U.S. which has long pursued the aggressive and criminal, anti-DPRK policy.
					
					 As respected Marshal Kim Jong Un declared in his New Year Address, the DPRK will continue to bolster up its capability for self-defence, the pivot of which is the nuclear force, and the capability for preemptive strike as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces keep on nuclear threat and blackmail and war games at the doorstep of the DPRK under the mask of annual ones.
					
					 ICBM will be launched anywhere anytime set by the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has right to self-defence!
					
					 The U.S., take its hands off Korea!
					
					 Stop war moves against the DPRK!

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek
Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek.
					Recorriendo varios puntos del complejo, el premier se cercioro de la situacion de produccion del hierro Juche.
					
					En la reunion de consulta de los funcionarios interesados convocada en el terreno, se dio enfasis en que los obreros del Complejo produzcan muchos materiales de hierro y acero para abrir la brecha en la construccion de potencia economica y se discutieron los remedios correspondientes.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la situacion miserable de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la situacion miserable de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- Ahora el Sur de Corea es ridiculizado por la sociedad internacional que lo considera como colonia de EE.UU.
					Ultimamente, los medios de prensa del mundo, inclusive Washington Post, estiman que el "Norte es la 'Corea de verdad', pero el Sur es la colonia subordinada politicamente a Estados Unidos", la "mayoria de los jovenes surcoreanos se simpatizan con el Norte de Corea considerando al Sur como colonia de EE.UU. sin ningun autoridad politica", "el Sur de Corea sigue siendo 'satelite' de EE.UU." y "el suelo surcoreano es la base militar de EE.UU. para la agresion al continente asiatico". 
					
					Es inusual que los principales medios calificaran asi al Sur de Corea al unisono y en lo publico.
					
					Segun sus reportes, "desde el comienzo del ano nuevo, la diplomacia surcoreana es la victima sobre la cual descargan su mal humor China, Japon y EE.UU." y el "Sur de Corea ya se convirtio en el tambor que China, Japon, Rusia y EE.UU. tocan a su antojo para perseguir los intereses estatales".
					
					Es una evaluacion merecida sobre la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye que durante su mandato, dejo el Sur de Corea a la voracidad de las potencias practicando la politica vendepatria, servil a grandes potencias y opuesta a la reunificacion. 
					
					Practicamente, en protesta al emplazamiento de THAAD, China comenzo a implementar las medidas de venganza economica contra el Sur de Corea mientras Japon le regana tanto por el tema de la estatua de nina esclava sexual, levantada ante el consulado general de Japon en Pusan.
					
					Por su parte, la nueva administracion estadounidense ya asigno a nuevos embajadores en China y Japon, pero no ha nominado siquiera al embajador en el Sur de Corea.
					
					El que no tiene postura independiente, sera maltratado por todos.
					
					Lo demuestra el caso de la traidora Park tratada ahora como idiota si bien sirvio fielmente a su amo gringo entregandole por entero la soberania en todos los planos como politica, economia, asuntos militares, alimento y medioambiente y practicando la politica de enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Es cosa deplorable para la poblacion surcoreana que eligio a esa mujerzuela como "presidenta".
					
					Si se deja intactas a las fuerzas conservadoras anti-reunificacion como Park que buscan la salida en la confrontacion fratricida sin distinguir al verdadero enemigo de la nacion, los habitantes surcoreanos no podran evitar jamas la verguenza y afrenta. 
					
					Hoy dia, los conservadores surcoreanos tratan de enganar a la opinion publica sonando con retomar el poder y EE.UU. hace todo lo posible para mantener su regimen colonial metiendo su nariz en los asuntos de la nacion coreana. 
					
					La poblacion surcoreana debera levantarse en la lucha pannacional por frustrar los desafios de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena actos provocativos de los belicistas militares surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena actos provocativos de los belicistas militares surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- Los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana iniciaron el dia 16 los ejercicios tacticos del tiempo de mucho frio pretextando la supuesta "amenaza nuclear del Norte (de Corea)" y la "provocacion local". 
					Hace poco, la Agencia de Asuntos de Defensa del Sur de Corea publico el plan de importar desde el extranjero los equipos de guerra ultramodernos, incluso decenas de helicopteros de operacion naval, abogando por la "capacidad de reaccion urgente" a la "amenaza de misil balistico del submarino norcoreano".
					
					Al mismo tiempo, las autoridades surcoreanas pronuncian disparates belicosos tales como "aumento de las fuerzas de seguridad" y "hacer frente a la provocacion".
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 21 un comentario individual calificando tales chismes y acciones del Sur de Corea de una aventura que instiga la exacerbacion de tension de la Peninsula Coreana y lleva la situacion al umbral de guerra y de una provocacion deliberada para buscar la salvacion del "poder" traidor al levantar la fuerte oleada de guerra anti-RPDC y crear la "crisis de seguridad".
					
					Asi los titeres surcoreanos cometen el imperdonable acto traidor de apuntar con el fusil a todos los coreanos que esperan con ansia la paz y la reunificacion del pais, reitera el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Sus provocaciones militares, que se reportan desde el principio del ano, dejan conocer la intencion criminal de continuar a lo largo del ano los ejercicios de guerra anti-Norte.
					
					Si la banda traidora del Sur de Corea sigue desafiando a los esfuerzos sinceros de la parte connacional por la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la eliminacion del peligro de guerra, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC aniquilaran a esos fanaticos de guerra y reunificaran sin falta la patria.
